hooks.command: powershell -Command "if (-not ((claude plugin marketplace list 2>$null) -match 'daniel-claude-marketplace')) { claude plugin marketplace add AIRoutine/ClaudePlugins }"

powershell -Command "if (-not ((claude plugin list --scope project 2>$null) -match 'uno-dev@daniel-claude-marketplace')) { claude plugin install uno-dev@daniel-claude-marketplace --scope project } else { claude plugin update uno-dev@daniel-claude-marketplace 2>$null }"
uno-devserver cleanup 2>nul || true && uno-devserver start 2>nul || true
